params.flag: Set the semi public flag to true/false.
Set the transfer capability to active or not.

returns._0: `true` if transfers are disabled, `false` if transfers are enabled.

Burnt(uint256,string).notice: Emited whenever an burning happens in a FAST.

DetailsChanged(bool,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: This is an event that is fired whenever any of some of the FAST parameters change, so that the frontend can react to it and refresh the general header for that fast as well as the baseball cards in the FASTs list.

GovernorAdded(address).notice: Emited when a governor is added to the implementing contract.

GovernorRemoved(address).notice: Emited when a governor is removed to the implementing contract.

MemberAdded(address).notice: Emited when a member is added to the implementing contract.

MemberRemoved(address).notice: Emited when a member is removed to the implementing contract.

Minted(uint256,string).notice: Emited whenever an issuance happens in a FAST.

hasFixedSupply().notice: Is this FAST a fixed supply FAST?

isSemiPublic().notice: Is this FAST a semi public FAST?

setIsSemiPublic(bool).notice: Allows to switch from a private scheme to a semi-public scheme,  but not the other way around.

setTransfersDisabled(bool).notice: Allows an issuer member to enable or disable all transfers within this FAST.

transfersDisabled().notice: Are transfers enabled across this FAST?
